author: Paul Jones
title: FleetOps with Anthos Config Controller - Clusters, Config and Meshes | Jetstack Blog
description: FleetOps can enhance how organisations create, configure and control Kubernetes clusters in Google Cloud. This first in a series of posts looking at Config Controller shows how to create a GKE Fleet with Anthos Config Management and Anthos Service Mesh to standardise compliance, security and cluster add-ons at scale.
